name: prlem1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5
body: |- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5)))

stmt.origin: ex(w0, w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5))

stmt.origin: jaao(w0, w1, wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4), w5)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), w5))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5)))

-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w5))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5)))
-| wi(w1, wi(wa(w3, w4), w5))
-| wi(w0, wb(w5, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w4)), w5)))

-| wi(w1, wi(w3, w5))

comment: A specialized lemma for set theory (to derive the Axiom of Pairing). (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 13-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 5-Jan-2013.)
